step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Try to bring your shoulder blades back and down a little more smoothly in the circular motion.
Excellent! You're really getting the circular motion down. Keep up the great work on squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Nicely done! Remember to inhale deeply as you pull your shoulders back to maximize the benefit. Keep that smooth circular movement.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the shoulder rolls! Focus on making the circular motion smooth and try to inhale deeply as you pull your shoulders back. This helps with breathing and mobility.
